DOC.brief_summary: To establish serum tissue bank specimen form patient colorectal cancer , subsequent immunological biochemical analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Tissue Serum Collection From Colorectal Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients must undergo surgery resection primary tumor , resection hepatic metastasis , hepatic artery catheter pump implant unresectable hepatic metastasis . For tumor specimen remove surgery , lesion must large enough allow routine pathological analysis , excision residual otherwise discard material tumor bank .
